request.description: Implement the 4 orchestration system enhancements from PLAN_ORCHESTRATION_ENHANCEMENTS_20251208: (1) Parallel Execution Engine - dispatch instructions for parallel agent spawning, (2) Real-Time Dashboard - terminal UI with blessed, (3) Evidence Chain Validation - requirement to test traceability, (4) Session Templates - pre-built workflow patterns. Priority order: Evidence Chain → Templates → Parallel Engine → Dashboard. Test implementations and document with Serena memories.
